languages.text: "Соратники, нас предали! К бою, прольем кровь нечестиво{mf|го|й} холу{mf|я|йки} ксеносов! За Императора-а-а!"
"My brothers and sisters in arms, we've been betrayed! To battle! Let us spill the blood of {mf|he|she} who obeys the unhallowed whims of xenos! For the Emperooor!"
languages.original_text: "Соратники, нас предали! К бою, прольем кровь нечестиво{mf|го|й} холу{mf|я|йки} ксеносов! За Императора-а-а!"

traits.locale_text: "My comrades-in-arms, we've been betrayed! To battle! Let us spill the blood of {mf|he|she} who obeys the unhallowed whims of xenos! For the Emperooor!"
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

traits.locale_text: "My brothers and sisters in arms, we've been betrayed! To battle! Let us spill the blood of {mf|he|she} who obeys the unhallowed whims of xenos! For the Emperooor!"
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: “兄弟们，姐妹们！我们遭到了背叛！这个该死的叛徒为异形效力！杀了{mf|他|她}，让{mf|他|她}血溅当场！为了帝——皇！”
languages.original_text: "My brothers and sisters in arms, we've been betrayed! To battle! Let us spill the blood of {mf|he|she} who obeys the unhallowed whims of xenos! For the Emperooor!"

traits.locale_text: “兄弟们，姐妹们！我们遭到了背叛！这个该死的叛徒为异形效力！杀了{mf|他|她}，让{mf|他|她}血溅当场！为了帝——皇！”
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: 「兄弟姉妹よ、我々は裏切られた！武器をとれ！異種族の邪悪な気まぐれに従う者の血を流せ！皇帝のために！」
languages.original_text: "My brothers and sisters in arms, we've been betrayed! To battle! Let us spill the blood of {mf|he|she} who obeys the unhallowed whims of xenos! For the Emperooor!"

traits.locale_text: 「兄弟姉妹よ、我々は裏切られた！武器をとれ！異種族の邪悪な気まぐれに従う者の血を流せ！皇帝のために！」
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: «¡Hermanos y hermanas de armas, nos han traicionado! ¡A la batalla! ¡Derramemos la sangre de quien obedece los caprichos impíos de los xenos! ¡Por el Emperadooor!».
languages.original_text: "My brothers and sisters in arms, we've been betrayed! To battle! Let us spill the blood of {mf|he|she} who obeys the unhallowed whims of xenos! For the Emperooor!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Hermanos y hermanas de armas, nos han traicionado! ¡A la batalla! ¡Derramemos la sangre de quien obedece los caprichos impíos de los xenos! ¡Por el Emperadooor!».
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.original_text: "My brothers and sisters in arms, we've been betrayed! To battle! Let us spill the blood of {mf|he|she} who obeys the unhallowed whims of xenos! For the Emperooor!"

languages.text: « Mes frères, mes sœurs, nous avons été trahis ! Aux armes ! Versons le sang de {mf|celui|celle} qui s'est {mf|soumis|soumise} à la volonté impie des xénos ! Pour l'Empereur ! »
languages.original_text: "My brothers and sisters in arms, we've been betrayed! To battle! Let us spill the blood of {mf|he|she} who obeys the unhallowed whims of xenos! For the Emperooor!"

traits.locale_text: « Mes frères, mes sœurs, nous avons été trahis ! Aux armes ! Versons le sang de {mf|celui|celle} qui s'est {mf|soumis|soumise} à la volonté impie des xénos ! Pour l'Empereur ! »
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Meine Waffenbrüder und -schwestern, wir wurden verraten! In die Schlacht! Lasst uns das Blut {mf|desjenigen vergießen, der|derjenigen vergießen, die} den unheiligen Launen von Xenos gehorcht! Für den Imperatooor!"
languages.original_text: "My brothers and sisters in arms, we've been betrayed! To battle! Let us spill the blood of {mf|he|she} who obeys the unhallowed whims of xenos! For the Emperooor!"

traits.locale_text: "Meine Waffenbrüder und -schwestern, wir wurden verraten! In die Schlacht! Lasst uns das Blut {mf|desjenigen vergießen, der|derjenigen vergießen, die} den unheiligen Launen von Xenos gehorcht! Für den Imperatooor!"
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Silah arkadaşlarım, ihanete uğradık! Saldırın! Zenoların dinsiz taleplerine itaat edenin kanını dökeceğiz! İmparator adınaaaaa!"
languages.original_text: "My brothers and sisters in arms, we've been betrayed! To battle! Let us spill the blood of {mf|he|she} who obeys the unhallowed whims of xenos! For the Emperooor!"

traits.locale_text: "Silah arkadaşlarım, ihanete uğradık! Muharebeye! Zenoların dinsiz taleplerine itaat eden kişinin kanını dökme zamanı! İmparator adınaaaaa!"
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True
